page.title: 09WARGRAVE VILLAGE FESTIVAL
page.content:
{The Wargrave Festival}occurs every second year.{The Theatre Workshop}puts on a musical,{The Wargrave Runners} organise a mini-marathon and other village societies hold events. The highlight is the{Procession}of floats through the village to{Mill Green which is by the Church. This year the theme of the procession was{Sports and {Recreation}through the ages.
The Green resembles an outdoor market with decorated stalls and a bandstand. Visitors can buy refreshments, craft items and play games like Hoopla. Money raised is shared between the group organising each stall and the Festival organisers. At a village meeting it is decided how to use the profit for the benefit of the community.
